name: Vastitas Fracturae
description:
Vastitas Fracturae is a short and atmospheric spaceship bullet hell simulator where you take on the role of navigating your ship through a hostile environment of space with your outdated, 10 seconds per ping, radar and a static map to guide you.

Your success depends on your ability incorporate information between the map of the surroundings and your active radar. Only those who survive will uncover the truth behind The Vastitas Fracturae. Fair Winds and Following Seas, Captain.

Made as a Ludum Dare 51 submission. 

Note: browser version may lag while switching scenes. give it a few seconds
